Others: Paul George of the Philadelphia 76ers hyper-extended his left knee during an NBA pre-season game against the Atlanta Hawks.
George scored 8 points in 12 minutes before leaving the game.
Sixers coach Nick Nurse expressed hope that George would return 'right away'.
Joel Embiid, another star player for the 76ers, is not playing in any pre-season games due to a management plan for his surgically repaired left knee.
